mapper.insert: INSERT INTO spring_users (user_id, user_name, user_password, user_email, user_tel, user_age, user_birth) VALUES (#{id}, #{name}, #{password}, #{email}, #{tel}, #{age}, #{birth})
mapper.select: SELECT user_id AS id, user_name AS name, user_password AS password, user_email AS email, user_tel AS tel, user_age AS age, user_birth AS birth, user_created_date AS createdDate FROM spring_users WHERE user_id = #{value}
